name: Zitara Technologies, Inc.
headline: Predictive battery management software for electrified fleets
description:
Batteries have a big role to play in tackling the climate crisis, and it’s essential to make sure that they’re safe and reliable to operate.

At Zitara, we build cutting-edge software solutions that empower companies to deeply understand their batteries, both in design and deployment. It’s all part of our work to enable a renewable energy revolution, powered by safer batteries, at a lower cost, with less waste.

founders.name: Shyam Srinivasan, Founder
founders.description:
Shyam started his career in consumer electronics. But after nearly a decade helping to architect, design, and manufacture 10+ products for companies like Apple, Nest, and Google, he began to think about the environmental impact of building devices that embody a great deal of energy in countries with loose emissions standards, and inevitably end up in landfills.

He and Evan founded Zitara with the mission of accelerating the electrification of transportation and grid-scale energy storage.

founders.name: Evan Murphy, Founder
founders.description:
CTO and co-founder, Zitara Technologies.

Generalist software engineer with 10+ years experience, focusing on data infrastructure. Previously:
 - Tower Research - infrastructure for HFT
 - Tesla - Simulation for Autopilot
 - Stemcentrx (acq by Abbvie) - lab informatics for cancer research

Also co-founded a toy company, E&M Labs: 3 Kickstarter projects, ~10 kilotrebuchets, 2 laser cutters, 4 years of retail sales.

# confidence in your battery energy storage system
## Realize your storage asset's true capacity.
Zitara's real-time, on-premise solution knows exactly how much energy is available in your battery storage system and intelligently optimizes your operations.
[Talk to an expert](https://zitara.com/</contact>)
### More accurate signals + smarter balancing = up to 15% additional capacity unlocked.
Zitara’s accurate power and balance algorithms replace your unreliable signals, giving you visibility into your rack-level imbalance levels as well as reliable trading signals. This unlocks intelligent balancing programs and more aggressive trading strategies. Less downtime. More money.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638fa87f6484d77de39a3a89/6705348b03b8243ab47426c3_zitra_illustration_unlock.svg)
#### Improved Availability
Zitara algorithms will accurately communicate the state of your asset, giving you confidence into how much power you have available and for how long. Now you can finally be more aggressive with your trading strategies.
#### Optimized Balancing
Zitara gives you visibility into the imbalance of your asset, down to the rack, or string, level. This visibility allows you to prioritize your balancing activities at a more granular level.
#### Reduced Downtime
Now that you know which racks to balance, and for how long, you no longer need to guess which racks to balance. Out-of-balance racks come down, in-balance racks do not.
## Industry Challenges facing Utilities, IPPs, and Operators.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638fa87f6484d77de39a3a89/64c29552d047fa442a9844a8_eso-industy_icon0.svg)
### Batteries are complicated, and it's hard to know what to ask when investing in a new asset.
Factors like cell choice, environmental controls, and operating limits all impact the performance and longevity of your asset. Without a team of battery experts, knowing what to ask your OEMs and integrators is challenging.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638fa87f6484d77de39a3a89/64c2947902ce8dcbecf05193_eso-industy_icon2.svg)
### Your onboard battery management system starts out wrong and gets worse over time.
Your system’s available energy is a more complex calculation than the state of charge. Even worse, a three-year-old battery is a different battery than it was on day one. Your built-in battery management system doesn’t adequately account for degradation, compounding errors over time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638fa87f6484d77de39a3a89/64c2947950e1cf1dda121928_eso-industy_icon3.svg)
### Surprise shutdowns are avoidable, but not with data from a typical battery management system.
Unknown energy availability, cell imbalances, and thermal issues are some of the root causes of surprise shutdowns. Most assets come with fixed safety limits that don't account for these dynamic conditions. These assets fail to alert early enough, causing avoidable shutdowns.
## We know your batteries, so we can tell you exactly what they’re capable of.
### Zitara conducts an in-depth analysis and characterization of your specific battery cell model. This analysis considers age, chemistry, and location of each cell within your battery system. Using predictive modeling with your system’s existing sensors, Zitara’s algorithms know exactly how much energy you can dispatch at any moment.
### See your asset’s true energy availability for the first time.
Knowing your system’s dispatchable power enables your team to make timely and strategic decisions to operate profitably.
### Enable continuous balancing.
Zitara’s software monitors the State of Charge of every cell in your system, allowing you to continuously balance with confidence. Eliminate costly balancing down-time and unlock the full capacity of your asset on each and every cycle.
### Identify risks before they become catastrophes.
Avoid costly incidents with dynamic safety limits and service alerts that flag balance-of-system issues like water damage or HVAC failure.
### Ensure your system runs reliably.
Zitara’s software integrates with your existing battery management system to give you accurate data and service alerts about overheating, cell imbalances, and energy availability.
### Work with more than one OEM.
Zitara’s software adapts to every manufacturer, so you can confidently compare assets and trust the data is adjusted for inconsistencies across different manufacturers and components.
### Take the guesswork out of battery procurement.
Zitara translates your requirements into simulations that show the capabilities of your system so you can design for years of reliable operation. All without having to staff a team of in-house battery experts.
[Talk to an expert](https://zitara.com/</contact>)
## Zitara Offers Three Products
## Zitara Power
### Zitara Power is an on premise algorithm that monitors cell-level raw data inputs your asset already tracks — voltage, current, and temperature — and produces accurate real time controls signals like State of Power, State of Energy, HSL, MXDP, and State of Charge. These control signals replace the error-prone signals provided by your existing system.
## Zitara Balance
### Zitara Balance is an on premise algorithm that monitors cell-level raw data inputs your asset already tracks — voltage, current, and temperature — and produces real time balance/imbalance signals at the rack level. This signal prioritizes each rack in your balance queue. No more site-wide downtime or guessing - balanced racks remain undisturbed, online, and generating revenue.
## Zitara Insight
### Zitara Insight is a service providing an analysis on historical production data from your asset. The resulting report identifies evidence of, and root causes for, control signal errors, rack level imbalances, and safety issues. This report gives you actionable information driving asset revenue optimization.
## If you have assets in the field that aren't behaving as expected, talk to us about a Zitara Insights Report.
The Zitara Insights Report is a direct view into how well your system performs in real-world scenarios and reveals specific deficiencies in your system. With your Insights Report results you can confidently work with your vendors and integrators to correct any problems and efficiently plan for upgrades or augmentation.
[Schedule a Zitara Insights Report](https://zitara.com/</contact>)
## Learn more
#### [NewsZitara Secures $17M in Series AA Funding led by Salesforce Ventures to Accelerate Battery Management Software Innovation](https://zitara.com/</resources/zitara-secures-17m-in-series-aa-funding>)
#### [Battery BasicsMastering Battery Management Systems (BMS): A Comprehensive Guide to Common BMSs (And How to Make Them Better)](https://zitara.com/</resources/battery-management-system>)
#### [Expert InsightsAlgorithm Accuracy Is Essential: Getting a Guaranteed State of Charge, Part 1](https://zitara.com/</resources/algorithm-accuracy-is-essential-part-1>)
## FAQs
How do Energy Storage Systems work?
Energy Storage Systems (ESS) work by storing excess energy during periods of low demand and releasing it when demand is high or during power outages. This is achieved through various technologies, such as batteries, pumped hydro storage, or thermal storage, which store energy in different forms and convert it back to electricity when needed.
What is the difference between energy storage and battery storage?
Energy storage is a broader term encompassing various technologies that store energy, including mechanical, thermal, and chemical methods. Battery storage specifically refers to the use of rechargeable batteries as a form of energy storage, utilizing chemical reactions to store and release electrical energy.
How does Zitara help Energy Storage Systems?
[Zitara Live](https://zitara.com/</zitara-live>) runs directly on Battery Energy Storage Systems, constantly monitoring all the battery sensor signals and putting this data to work to help you understand how your battery is operating. By engaging directly with your asset, Zitara delivers actionable insights for day-to-day operations, eliminating the dependency on a network connection.

### Zitara Technologies, Inc. Overview

**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Employees:** 33  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S20  
**Website:** [zitara.com](https://zitara.com)  

**Mission:** 
Zitara Technologies is on a mission to revolutionize how we manage battery systems in electrified fleets. Their predictive battery management software aims to enhance safety and reliability while supporting the necessary transition to renewable energy.

### What They Do

Batteries are critical in tackling the climate crisis, and Zitara has stepped up to ensure that they function safely and effectively. Their software offers insights that help businesses not just design but also optimize battery usage in the field. By providing real-time monitoring and actionable data, Zitara empowers companies to unlock more capacity from their energy storage systems—potentially adding up to 15% more capacity just by improving visibility and management.

#### Key Products

1. **Zitara Power**: This algorithm transforms existing, often flawed, signals into accurate real-time control signals regarding your battery’s state of power and energy.

2. **Zitara Balance**: This product monitors and prioritizes balancing needs at a granular level for every rack, eliminating broad downtime and maximizing revenue potential.

3. **Zitara Insight**: Analyzes historical data from your battery systems to identify issues and improve performance, ultimately optimizing revenue drivers.

### Industry Challenges They Address

- **Complexity of Batteries**: Understanding what to ask and which specs matter when investing in battery assets is a daunting task without expert guidance.
  
- **Management System Flaws**: Many onboard systems start with great data but degrade over time. Zitara’s solutions tackle this issue with accurate predictive modeling.

- **Unexpected Shutdowns**: Conventional management systems often miss early signs of trouble due to rigid safety protocols—Zitara adapts to changing conditions proactively.

### Future-Focused Funding

Recently, Zitara secured **$17 million** in Series AA funding led by Salesforce Ventures, which will help accelerate their software innovations. This foothold allows Zitara to further develop their expertise and solidify their position in a rapidly evolving market.

### Conclusion

Zitara Technologies, Inc. is carving a niche at the intersection of tech and sustainability, helping businesses make informed decisions about battery management while contributing to a greener future. With predictive insights and advanced software solutions, they're not just managing batteries—they're empowering a revolution in energy storage efficiency and reliability. 

Want to learn more? Check out their [blog](https://zitara.com/battery-blog) or get in touch via their [contact page](https://zitara.com/contact).
